data.description: Execute an external program (${external.program.cmdline}) without waiting for it to terminate. After the target program is executed, Nexial will proceed with the remaining execution. Check ${nexial.lastOutputLink} for program output.

expects.name: external.program.cmdline
expects.description: the fully qualified path of the external program to execute

data.description: Execute an external program (${external.program.cmdline}). Check ${nexial.lastOutputLink} for program output.

expects.name: external.program.cmdline
expects.description: the fully qualified path of the external program to execute

data.description: Find the process ID (pid) of an active process (${external.program.execname}).

expects.name: external.program.execname
expects.description: file name of an active process/program

data.description: Terminate an active process/program via its process ID (${external.program.pid}). Check ${nexial.lastOutputLink} for console output.

expects.name: external.program.pid
expects.description: process ID of the target process
